Method Detail

getCommand

static PostfixDriver.Command getCommand()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Gets the next driver command issued at the terminal.

Returns:
Next command. If there are three erroneous attempts, the quit command is returned.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an i/o error in reading the next command.

startEval

static void startEval()
               throws java.io.IOException
Starts the evaluation.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an i/o error in reading the postfix expression.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        IllegalExpressionException
Entry point into the driver.

Parameters:
args - No arguments are required.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is any i/o error in the evaluation process.
IllegalExpressionException - If the given expression is not legal postfix.
